projects.name: HT-Graph: Heterogeneous Continuous-Time Dynamic Graph Representation Learning
projects.description: Developed a model to improve prediction performance and computational efficiency for large, dynamic, heterogeneous graphs using neighbor-aware learning, neighbor-store, and restarter modules.

projects.name: Human Activity Recognition on UCF-50 Dataset
projects.description: Developed a human activity recognition system for video data using Convolutional Neural Networks (CNNs) and Long Short-Term Memory (LSTM) networks.

projects.name: Traffic Forecasting on Metropolitan LA Dataset
projects.description: Built a traffic forecasting model using Temporal Graph Neural Networks (TGNNs) to predict traffic speed in real-time based on spatial and temporal data.

projects.name: Deepseek PDF Chat: AI-Powered PDF Query System Using LangChain and Ollama
projects.description: Built a PDF-based question-answering system using LangChain, leveraging text chunking, embedding generation, and vector storage for efficient semantic search and retrieval-augmented generation (RAG). Integrated a Streamlit-based UI with the Deepseek language model (deepseek-r1:1.5b) via langchain-ollama, enabling real-time, context-aware query responses.
